name: User Tag Bot
description: User tagger bot is a bot that tags your members for free.

BOT_NAME.description: User Tag A name for your bot. Please do not use ascii characters.

BOT_USERNAME.description: Enter the address of the bot.

SUDO_USERS.description: Enter the owner of the bot.

OWNER_ID.description: The user IDs of the user(s) you want to add as the OWNER. Multiple values must be separated by a space.

OWNER_USERNAME.description: Enter the address of the bot owner.
